movie-description: In a small town in Japan, Kirie comes upon her boyfriend's father silently videotaping a snail. He seems unaware of her presence and she thinks no more of it. Later, the mans obsession with spirals becomes more and more bizarre, ending in his suicide in a washing machine which turn his body into a spiral. Soon other inhabitants become possesed with different forms of spirals, one student seems to be mutating into a snail, another's hair becomes strangely medusa-like. The entire town becomes possesed.
movie-short-description: Directed by Higuchinsky.  With Eriko Hatsune, Fhi Fan, Hinako Saeki, Eun-Kyung Shin. The inhabitants of a small Japanese town become increasingly obsessed with and tormented by spirals.
